content:
Heather Fleming said
how can I enable access for less secure apps in Mozilla Thunderbird. I'm hoping this will solve my sign in problems

Google have completely withdrawn less secure apps some 12 months ago. You must now use oauth authentication for google.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
I suggest you offer the developers your feedback. connect.mozilla.org/

Use of old version is really not a good choice. Others might give you procedures to revert to an older version, but I will not because it will cause issues going forward. Not the least of which is being prompted to update every little while.
creator: MattAuSupport
